page.title: 02Publications about: FINTRY
page.content:
1.{Fintry.}A 14 page guidebook produced by the Community Council. It is regularly up-dated and is available from the Post Office at 35p. It contains a pen picture of the parish, details of all services available and a 2\ inch map of the area.
2.{The Story of Fintry.}Douglas Wilson The history of the village described in a privately published book.
3.{The Nature Trail at Culcreuch.} A booklet compiled by the 1977 Primary 7 class at Fintry Primary School.
4.{The Galbraith Clan and Culcreuch. Written by Nigel Barnes Watt.
5.{Strathendrick and its Inhabitants {in Early Times.}John Guthrie Smith. Published in 1886.
